overview: A splash of water...a sweltering sun...the faces of handsome men...and the steady, constant beat of the music. The story is minimal...the action is hot as these gorgeous hunks move and gyrate in sexual frenzy. Different couples, different groups...towers of man flesh...huge cocks and balls...asses ripe for action...mouths and tongues sucking and fucking...rimming hungry assholes...fingers and holes...tongues and holes...the music beats on and on...the rhythm drives the action, driving the energy, driving these horny gods into a hedonistic dance of sex and more sex...the orgy beats on as the sun goes down...images of sex-crazed men giving pleasure to one another...it isn't enough, there has to be more...the lust, the desire, the passion is endless as the couples, the three-ways, the four-ways play hard and fast...on and on. Soak it in man, it's worth the ride!
title: Soaked
